short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the Zendesk Guide article ID to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily identify the article ID of the current Zendesk article you're on. The article ID will reveal itself beside the title (at the top) when you click on the extension icon.

Bonus: Clicking on the extension icon also automatically copies the article ID to your clipboard.
